titles.title: At The Cross or His Love Ran Red

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There’s a place where mercy reigns And never dies There’s a place where streams of grace Flow deep and wide chorus1 : Where all the love I’ve ever found Comes like a flood Comes flowing down{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}At the cross, at the cross I surrender my life I’m in awe of You I’m in awe of You Where Your love ran red And my sin washed white I owe all to You I owe all to You, Jesus{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There’s a place Where sin and shame Are powerless Where my heart has peace with God And forgiveness{/lang-eng}
